channel.title: Cocktails on Official Cocktails
channel.description: Recent content in Cocktails on Official Cocktails

item.title: Alexander
item.description: Alexander is a classic cocktail made with gin, cream, and crème de cacao. It was first created in the early 20th century and is often garnished with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

item.title: Americano
item.description: The Americano is a classic cocktail made with Campari, sweet vermouth, and club soda. It is known for its bitter and refreshing taste.

item.title: Angel face
item.description: Angel Face is a classic cocktail made with gin, Calvados, and apricot brandy. It has a smooth, fruity flavor with a subtle floral note.

item.title: Aviation
item.description: Aviation is a classic gin-based cocktail that typically mixes gin, maraschino liqueur, crème de violette, and lemon juice. This American cocktail is known for its striking blueish-purple hue, floral and citrusy flavor, and perfect balance of sweet and sour.

item.title: Barracuda
item.description: Barracuda is a popular tropical cocktail made with rum, pineapple juice, lime juice and a splash of blue curaçao. It is a refreshing and fruity drink that is perfect for sipping on a warm day.

item.title: Bee's knees
item.description: Bee’s knees is a classic prohibition-era cocktail made with gin, honey, and lemon. It has a sweet and citrusy flavor profile and is often served chilled.

item.title: Bellini
item.description: Bellini is a cocktail made with Prosecco and peach purée. It originated in Venice, Italy in the 1930s.

item.title: Between the sheets
item.description: Between the Sheets is a classic cocktail made with rum, brandy, and triple sec, shaken with fresh lemon juice. It has a strong and smooth taste, perfect for cocktail lovers looking for something new.

item.title: Black Russian
item.description: Black Russian is a classic cocktail made with vodka and coffee liqueur. It is typically served on the rocks and garnished with a cherry or orange slice.

item.title: Bloody Mary
item.description: Bloody Mary is a cocktail made with vodka, tomato juice, and various seasonings, often served with a celery stalk garnish. It is a classic brunch drink and known for its savory and spicy taste.

item.title: Boulevardier
item.description: Boulevardier is a classic cocktail made with whiskey, Campari, and sweet vermouth. It has a bittersweet and complex flavor profile.

item.title: Bramble
item.description: Bramble is a classic cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, sugar syrup, and blackberry liqueur. It’s a refreshing and fruity drink with a hint of tartness.

item.title: Brandy crusta
item.description: Brandy crusta is a classic cocktail made with brandy, orange liqueur, lemon juice, and a sugared rim. It is often garnished with a strip of lemon rind.

item.title: Caipirinha
item.description: Caipirinha is a traditional Brazilian cocktail made with Cachaça, lime, and sugar. It is a refreshing and tangy drink that is popular both nationally and internationally.

item.title: Canchanchara
item.description: Canchanchara is a traditional Cuban cocktail made with rum, honey, and lime juice. It is believed to have been a popular drink among Cuban soldiers during the war of independence.

item.title: Casino
item.description: Casino is a popular carbonated soft drink with a tangy, fruity flavor that originated in Puerto Rico. Its bright red color and unique taste make it a favorite among locals and visitors alike.

item.title: Champagne cocktail
item.description: A Champagne cocktail is a classic cocktail that includes Champagne or other sparkling wine as the key ingredient. It typically includes a liqueur, bitters, and sometimes sugar.

item.title: Clover Club
item.description: Clover Club is a classic gin-based cocktail with raspberry syrup, lemon juice, and egg white. It is sweet, tart, and frothy, and is often served in a coupe glass with a garnish of raspberry or lemon twist.

item.title: Corpse reviver #2
item.description: Corpse Reviver #2 is a classic cocktail that blends gin, Cointreau, Lillet Blanc, and lemon juice. It is refreshing, citrusy, and has a distinctive herbal flavor.

item.title: Cosmopolitan
item.description: Cosmopolitan is a classic cocktail made with vodka, cranberry juice, and orange liqueur. It is typically served in a martini glass and garnished with a twist of lemon or a slice of lime.

item.title: Cuba libre
item.description: Cuba libre is a refreshing cocktail made with cola, lime juice, and rum. It originated in Cuba and is a popular drink in many parts of the world.

item.title: Daiquiri
item.description: Daiquiri is a classic cocktail originally from Cuba made with rum, lime juice, and simple syrup. It is a refreshing and tart drink perfect for summer sipping.

item.title: Dark 'n' stormy
item.description: A Dark ’n’ Stormy is a classic cocktail made with dark rum and ginger beer. It is a refreshing and flavorful drink that is perfect for any occasion.

item.title: Dry martini
item.description: Dry martini is a classic cocktail made with gin or vodka and dry vermouth, served with an olive or lemon twist. The drink is popularized by James Bond in the film franchise.

item.title: Espresso martini
item.description: Espresso martini is a cocktail that combines the bitter taste of espresso with the sweetness of vodka and liqueur. It’s a popular after-dinner drink that provides a caffeine and alcohol boost.

item.title: Fernandito
item.description: Fernandito is a refreshing cocktail made with pineapple juice, ginger ale, and rum. Its sweet and tangy taste is perfect for a summer evening or a night out with friends.

item.title: French 75
item.description: French 75 is a classic cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and Champagne. It was named after the French 75mm field gun used in World War I.

item.title: French Connection
item.description: French Connection is a cocktail made of equal parts of cognac and Amaretto liqueur. Its name and ingredients are inspired by the Franco-American partnership during World War II.

item.title: French martini
item.description: The French martini is a fruity cocktail made with vodka, pineapple juice, and Chambord. It has a sweet and tangy flavor with a beautiful pink color.

item.title: Gin fizz
item.description: Gin fizz is a classic cocktail made from gin, lemon juice, sugar, and soda water. The frothy and refreshing drink is perfect for any occasion.

item.title: Golden dream
item.description: Golden dream is a popular cocktail made with Galliano liqueur, orange juice, and cream. It has a smooth and sweet flavor with a hint of vanilla and citrus.

item.title: Grasshopper
item.description: Grasshopper is a sweet, creamy cocktail made with crème de menthe, crème de cacao, and cream. It is typically served after-dinner as a digestif.

item.title: Hanky panky
item.description: Hanky Panky is a classic gin-based cocktail invented by Ada Coleman at the American Bar in the Savoy Hotel, London, in the early 1900s. It is made with equal parts gin, sweet vermouth, and Fernet-Branca, a herbal Italian digestif.

item.title: Hemingway special
item.description: The Hemingway Special is a classic cocktail made with white rum, grapefruit juice, maraschino liqueur, and fresh lime juice. Named after the famous author who loved to drink and write, this refreshing and tangy cocktail is perfect for summer sipping.

item.title: Horse's neck
item.description: Horse’s neck is a cocktail made with brandy and ginger ale, garnished with a lemon twist. It’s a classic drink that’s both flavorful and refreshing.

item.title: Illegal
item.description: Illegal is a premium mezcal made from 100% espadin agave in Oaxaca, Mexico. It has a smoky and complex flavor, and is perfect for sipping or mixing in cocktails.

item.title: Irish coffee
item.description: Irish coffee is a hot cocktail made with hot coffee, Irish whiskey, brown sugar, and whipped cream. It is a popular after-dinner drink that originated in Ireland.

item.title: John Collins
item.description: John Collins is a classic cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, sugar, and soda water. It is typically served over ice and garnished with a lemon twist and cherry.

item.title: Kir
item.description: Kir is a popular French apéritif made by adding crème de cassis (blackcurrant liqueur) to dry white wine. It is typically served chilled as a refreshing and fruity cocktail.

item.title: Last word
item.description: Last word is a classic cocktail made with equal parts of gin, green Chartreuse, maraschino liqueur, and fresh lime juice. It has a complex, herbal flavor with a balanced sweetness and acidity.

item.title: Lemon drop martini
item.description: The Lemon drop martini is a citrusy and refreshing cocktail that combines lemon juice, vodka, and sugar. It is often served in a chilled martini glass and garnished with a lemon twist.

item.title: Long Island iced tea
item.description: Long Island iced tea is a potent cocktail that combines multiple types of alcohol and has a taste similar to iced tea. It is often served in tall glasses with ice and garnished with lemon or lime.

item.title: Mai Tai
item.description: Mai Tai is a Polynesian-inspired cocktail made with rum, orange curacao, lime juice, and almond syrup. It gained popularity in the 1950s and 1960s and is often associated with tiki culture.

item.title: Manhattan
item.description: Manhattan is a classic cocktail made with whiskey, vermouth, and bitters, served with a cherry garnish. It is known for its smooth, bold flavor and is a popular choice among whiskey lovers.

item.title: Margarita
item.description: Margarita is a popular cocktail made with tequila, triple sec, and lime juice, often served in a salt-rimmed glass. It is a refreshing and tangy drink that is perfect for happy hour or any occasion.

item.title: Martinez
item.description: The Martinez is a classic cocktail made with gin, sweet vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and bitters. It is believed to be the predecessor to the modern-day Martini.

item.title: Mary Pickford
item.description: Mary Pickford is a classic cocktail made with white rum, pineapple juice, grenadine, and Maraschino liqueur. It is named after the popular Canadian-American actress and film producer Mary Pickford.

item.title: Mimosa
item.description: Mimosa is a brunch cocktail made with equal parts of champagne and orange juice. It’s a refreshing and light drink perfect for celebrating special occasions or relaxing on weekends.

item.title: Mint julep
item.description: Mint julep is a traditional southern cocktail made with fresh mint, sugar, bourbon, and crushed ice. It is typically served in a silver or pewter cup and garnished with a sprig of mint.

item.title: Mojito
item.description: Mojito is a refreshing cocktail made with rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint leaves. It’s a popular drink that originated in Cuba and is now enjoyed worldwide.

item.title: Monkey gland
item.description: Monkey gland is a South African cocktail made with gin and orange juice, flavored with grenadine and Worcestershire sauce. Despite its name, it does not contain any actual monkey gland.

item.title: Moscow mule
item.description: A Moscow mule is a popular cocktail made with vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice, served in a copper mug. The drink was first created in the 1940s and has since become a classic cocktail that is enjoyed by many.

item.title: Naked and famous
item.description: Naked and Famous is a modern classic cocktail that combines mezcal, Aperol, Chartreuse, and lime juice. This smoky and herbal drink is balanced, refreshing, and perfect for any occasion.

item.title: Negroni
item.description: Negroni is a classic Italian cocktail made with equal parts gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari. It is known for its bitter and complex flavor profile.

item.title: New York sour
item.description: New York sour is a popular cocktail made with bourbon or rye whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup, and red wine floated on top. It has a tangy, fruity flavor and a deep red color that makes it visually appealing.

item.title: Old Cuban
item.description: Old Cuban is a classic Cuban cocktail made with rum, lime juice, mint, bitters, and champagne. It is a refreshing and elegant drink that is perfect for any occasion.

item.title: Old fashioned
item.description: Old Fashioned is a classic cocktail made with whiskey, bitters, sugar, and water. It typically includes a twist of citrus peel and is served on the rocks in a lowball glass.

item.title: Paloma
item.description: Paloma is a tequila-based cocktail that is a popular and refreshing drink in Mexico. It is made with grapefruit soda, lime juice, and salt.

item.title: Paper plane
item.description: Paper plane is a cocktail made with equal parts bourbon, Amaro Nonino, Aperol, and lemon juice. It has a bittersweet and citrusy flavor that is perfect for whiskey lovers.

item.title: Paradise
item.description: Paradise is a sweet fruity cocktail made with rum and fruit juices, often served with a tropical garnish. It is a refreshing and vibrant drink that evokes images of paradise and relaxation.

item.title: Penicillin
item.description: Penicillin is a smoky yet refreshing cocktail made with scotch, honey and citrus. It was invented in 2005 by Australian bartender Sam Ross.

item.title: Piña colada
item.description: A Piña colada is a tropical cocktail made with coconut cream, pineapple juice, and rum. It is typically served blended or shaken and garnished with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.

item.title: Pisco sour
item.description: Pisco sour is a traditional cocktail made with pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white. It originates from Peru and Chile and is a popular drink in South America.

item.title: Planter's punch
item.description: Planter’s Punch is a classic Caribbean cocktail with a fruity flavor and rum base. It is typically made with citrus juices, grenadine, and sometimes a dash of bitters.

item.title: Porto flip
item.description: Porto flip is a classic cocktail made from port wine, brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. It has a rich, creamy texture and a sweet, warming taste that makes it a perfect winter cocktail.

item.title: Ramos fizz
item.description: Ramos fizz is a cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, sugar, cream, egg whites, and orange flower water, served over ice. It is a frothy, creamy drink with a tangy and fragrant taste.

item.title: Russian spring punch
item.description: Russian spring punch is a refreshing cocktail made with vodka, grapefruit juice, mint leaves, and sparkling water. It is perfect for warm weather and outdoor events.

item.title: Rusty nail
item.description: Rusty nail is a classic cocktail made with two main ingredients: Scotch whisky and Drambuie. It is typically served over ice and garnished with a twist of lemon.

item.title: Sazerac
item.description: Sazerac is a classic New Orleans cocktail made with rye whiskey, bitters, and absinthe. It is often considered one of the oldest cocktails in America.

item.title: Sea breeze
item.description: Sea breeze is a refreshing alcoholic cocktail made with vodka, grapefruit juice, and cranberry juice. It is often served over ice and garnished with a slice of lime.

item.title: Sex on the beach
item.description: Sex on the beach is a fruity cocktail made with vodka, peach schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice. It is a popular drink for summer parties and beach vacations.

item.title: Sidecar
item.description: Sidecar is a classic cocktail made with cognac, orange liqueur and lemon juice. It’s served in a sugared rimmed cocktail glass and garnished with lemon twist.

item.title: Singapore sling
item.description: Singapore sling is a gin-based cocktail that originated in Singapore. It is a sweet and fruity drink made with pineapple juice, cherry brandy, and other ingredients.

item.title: Southside
item.description: Southside is a classic cocktail made with gin, fresh mint leaves, lime juice, and simple syrup. It is a refreshing and minty drink, perfect for summer sipping.

item.title: Spritz
item.description: Spritz is an Italian cocktail made with prosecco, Aperol or Campari, and soda water. It is refreshing, light, and perfect for any occasion.

item.title: Stinger
item.description: Stinger is a classic cocktail made with brandy and white crème de menthe. Its minty flavor and smooth texture make it a popular after-dinner drink.

item.title: Suffering bastard
item.description: The Suffering Bastard is a popular cocktail consisting of bourbon, gin, lime juice, and ginger beer. It was first created during World War II in Cairo, Egypt.

item.title: Tequila sunrise
item.description: Tequila sunrise is a popular cocktail made with tequila, orange juice, and grenadine which gives it a layered sunrise effect, typically served over ice. This fruity and refreshing drink is perfect for sipping on a warm summer evening or at any festive occasion.

item.title: Tipperary
item.description: Tipperary is a classic cocktail made with Irish whiskey, sweet vermouth, and green chartreuse. It’s a delicious and complex drink with a herbal and slightly spicy taste.

item.title: Tommy's margarita
item.description: Tommy’s margarita is a classic cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and agave nectar. It is known for its balanced sweetness and tartness, making it a popular choice among margarita lovers.

item.title: Trinidad sour
item.description: Trinidad sour is a strong and tangy cocktail made with rye whiskey, orgeat syrup, lemon juice, and Angostura bitters. It is a popular drink in Trinidad and Tobago and has gained popularity in other parts of the world as well.

item.title: Tuxedo
item.description: Tuxedo is a classic cocktail made with gin, vermouth, and a dash of maraschino liqueur. It is typically garnished with a cherry and a twist of lemon peel.

item.title: Ve.n.to
item.description: Ve.n.to is a carbonated soft drink made with grape juice and sparkling water, originating from Venice, Italy. It has a sweet and slightly tangy flavor and is often served cold with a slice of lemon.

item.title: Vesper
item.description: Vesper is a cocktail made with gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc. It was famously ordered by James Bond in Ian Fleming’s novel, Casino Royale.

item.title: Vieux Carré
item.description: Vieux Carré is a classic cocktail that originated from New Orleans. It is made with rye whiskey, cognac, sweet vermouth, Benedictine, and bitters.

item.title: Whiskey sour
item.description: Whiskey sour is a classic cocktail made with whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar. It has a sweet and sour taste, and is usually served on the rocks.

item.title: White lady
item.description: White lady is a classic cocktail made with gin, Cointreau, and lemon juice. It has a tart and citrusy flavor and a pale yellow color.

item.title: Yellow bird
item.description: Yellow Bird is a tropical cocktail that features rum, orange juice, lime juice, and cream of coconut. It is typically garnished with a cherry or slice of pineapple.

item.title: Zombie
item.description: Zombie is a cocktail that contains a mix of various rums, fruit juices, and syrups. It is famously known for its high alcohol content and its ability to leave its consumers feeling “undead”.
